Module it.polimi.ingsw.am38
Package it.polimi.ingsw.am38.View

Interface Viewable

All Known Implementing Classes:
CLI, GUI
public interface Viewable
Implemented by both CLI/TUI and GUI, contains all the methods they implement

  • Method Details

    • showPlayerField

      void showPlayerField(String nickname)
      Shows the field of the Player having the chosen nickname (used only by CLI)
      Parameters:
      nickname - a String containing the name of the Player whose field is being requested

    • updateScore

      void updateScore(String nickname, int score)
      Updates the score of the Player who just ended their turn (4 times each round)
      Parameters:
      nickname - a String containing the name of the Player whose turn just ended
      score - an int representing the Score of the given Player

    • updateScreen

      void updateScreen()
      Method used only by TUI/CLI to update the entire view

    • printHelp

      void printHelp()
      Method use only by TUI/CLI to print the help box

    • startView

      ClientWriter startView(ClientCommandInterpreter clientCommandInterpreter)
      Method that start the view chosen (GUI or CLI)
      Parameters:
      clientCommandInterpreter - to let the 2 types of view to send the command to the server
      Returns:
      ClientWriter if the view chosen is TUI, null otherwise

    • personalObjectiveChoice

      void personalObjectiveChoice(Symbol topG, Symbol topR, String nickname, HashMap<String,Color> pc, HashMap<String,String[]> hcc, HashMap<String,StarterCard> psc, LinkedList<PlayableCard> ownHand, ObjectiveCard sharedObj1, ObjectiveCard sharedObj2, ObjectiveCard objChoice1, ObjectiveCard objChoice2, HashMap<String,VisibleElements> pve)
      Shows all the existing and available information while this Player has to choose his personal Objective between the 2 possible choices
      Parameters:
      pc - an HashMap of all Players' nicknames (key-String) and their Color (value)
      hcc - an HashMap of all Players' nicknames (key-String) and the colors of the cards in their Hand (value-Symbol[])
      psc - an HashMap of all Players' nicknames (key-String) and their choice of facing for their StarterCard (value-StarterCard)
      ownHand - a LinkedList containing the PlayableCard in this Player's Hand
      sharedObj1 - an ObjectiveCard representing the first shared Objective
      sharedObj2 - an ObjectiveCard representing the second shared Objective
      objChoice1 - an ObjectiveCard representing the first choice for this Player's personal Objective
      objChoice2 - an ObjectiveCard representing the second choice for this Player's personal Objective

    • starterCardFacingChoice

      void starterCardFacingChoice(StarterCard sc, Symbol gt, Symbol rt, GoldCard g1, GoldCard g2, ResourceCard r1, ResourceCard r2)
      Shows all the existing and available information while this Player has to choose his StarterCard facing
      Parameters:
      sc - the StarterCard this Player drew
      gt - a Symbol variable representing the color of the card on top of the gold deck
      rt - a Symbol variable representing the color of the card on top of the resource deck
      g1 - the first face-up GoldCard available to be drawn
      g2 - the second face-up GoldCard available to be drawn
      r1 - the first face-up ResourceCard available to be drawn
      r2 - the second face-up ResourceCard available to be drawn

    • setSymbolsTab

      void setSymbolsTab(String nickname, VisibleElements symTab)
      Setter for the table with the elements shawn on the field (used only by CLI)
      Parameters:
      nickname - of the player
      symTab - updated VisibleElements to put in the table

    • setCardInField

      void setCardInField(String nick, PlayableCard card, int x, int y)
      Method that tells all the clients that a player has successfully placed a card
      Parameters:
      nick - of the player who has placed
      card - placed
      x - coordinates of the card placed
      y - coordinates of the card placed

    • updateDraw

      void updateDraw(Symbol colorG, Symbol colorR, GoldCard gc1, GoldCard gc2, ResourceCard rc1, ResourceCard rc2, LinkedList<PlayableCard> card)
      Shows the deck and the hand updated after a draw
      Parameters:
      colorG - kingdom of the card on top of the gold deck
      colorR - kingdom of the card on top of the resource deck
      gc1 - the first face-up GoldCard
      gc2 - the second face-up GoldCard
      rc1 - the first face-up ResourceCard
      rc2 - the second face-up ResourceCard
      card - drawn

    • showFirstScreen

      void showFirstScreen(String thisNick)
      Shows the screen in which the game actually start after the setup phase
      Parameters:
      thisNick - nickname of the player

    • setPersonalObjective

      void setPersonalObjective(ObjectiveCard objective)
      Setter method for this Player's chosen personal Objective
      Parameters:
      objective - the ObjectiveCard chosen by this Player

    • receiveMessage

      void receiveMessage(String messageReceived)
      Updates the chat by adding the new message received
      Parameters:
      messageReceived - a String containing the message received

      Method used only by CLI to print messages

      s -

      s -

    • updateCardDisplay

      void updateCardDisplay(PlayableCard card, int x, int y)
      Method used to set the Card Display and update the game screen (used only by CLI)
      Parameters:
      card - the PlayableCard to display
      x - its x coordinate
      y - its y coordinate

    • receiveOwnMessage

      void receiveOwnMessage(String s)
      Method to print in the chat a message sent by the client itself
      Parameters:
      s - a String containing the message sent (already formatted correctly)

    • playersTurn

      void playersTurn(String name)
      Method that prints the messages for each player's start of turn
      Parameters:
      name - a String containing the nickname of the Player whose turn is starting

    • displayStringLogin

      void displayStringLogin(String s)
      Display messages in the login phase
      Parameters:
      s -

    • setHandAfterPlacement

      void setHandAfterPlacement(LinkedList<PlayableCard> cardsInHand)
      Updates the cards in the hand (used only by CLI)
      Parameters:
      cardsInHand - cards in the hand of the player to be shawn

    • updateOtherPlayerDraw

      void updateOtherPlayerDraw(String nickname, GoldCard gfu1, GoldCard gfu2, ResourceCard rfu1, ResourceCard rfu2, Symbol gtc, Symbol rtc, String[] hcc)
      Method used to update the game screen with all the information changed after an opponent draws a card
      Parameters:
      nickname - a String containing the name of the Player who drew a card
      gfu1 - GoldCard face up 1
      gfu2 - GoldCard face up 2
      rfu1 - ResourceCard face up 1
      rfu2 - ResourceCard face up 2
      gtc - Symbol of the card on top of the GoldDeck
      rtc - Symbol of the card on top of the ResourceDeck
      hcc - array of Strings containing the Hand cards colors

    • reconnectionInitialSetter

      void reconnectionInitialSetter(String ownNick, ObjectiveCard shObj1, ObjectiveCard shObj2, ObjectiveCard pObj, Symbol gt, Symbol rt, GoldCard g1, GoldCard g2, ResourceCard r1, ResourceCard r2, LinkedList<PlayableCard> cardsInHand, HashMap<String,PlayerDisconnectionResendInfo> pdr)

    • reconnectionCardsToPlay

      void reconnectionCardsToPlay(String nick, PlayableCard cardToPlay, int x, int y)

    • computeScreen

      void computeScreen()
